entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
